pageContent:
Vaidehi 
Software Development Engineer in Test 
Email: vaidehi.chala@outlook.com     Phone:  4699040773 
 
PROFESSION SUMMARY: 
 Working  as  a  Software  Development  Engineer  in  Test  for  about  8  years. Expertise  in  Software 
Development  Life  Cycle  (SDLC),  Software  Test  Life  Cycle  (STLC),  and  Agile  Scrum  and  Waterfall 
methodologies Skilled in testing both Client/Server and Web-based applications, demonstrating 
proficiency in both Manual and Automation Testing. 
 Extensive  experience  in  building  comprehensive  end-to-end  automation  solutions  utilizing 
Selenium WebDriver, TestNG, Appium, Maven, Jenkins, Cucumber, and Web Services (REST). 
 Capable of analyzing system and functional specifications, use cases, and business requirements 
to formulate scenarios and test cases, proficient in various validation testing techniques including 
Smoke,   Functional,   Integration,   System,   Regression,   Cross   Browser   Compatibility,   User

Smoke,   Functional,   Integration,   System,   Regression,   Cross   Browser   Compatibility,   User 
Acceptance, and Database testing. 
 Possesses knowledge  of  Object-Oriented  Programming  concepts  (OOPs)  such  as  Inheritance, 
Polymorphism, Abstraction, Encapsulation, Interface, Classes, and Abstract Classes. 
 Developed Test Scripts using Selenium WebDriver, Java, and TestNG framework, utilizing Maven 
build tools to effectively manage framework dependency jar files. 
 Proficient  in  developing  Data-Driven  and  Page  Object  Model  (POM)  frameworks  to  manage 
extensive Test Suites, with expertise in utilizing BDD methodologies through tools like Cucumber. 
 Conducted  both  manual  and  automated  testing  of  Restful  Web  Services,  employing  tools  like 
Postman and Apache HTTP Client for comprehensive testing coverage. 
 Experienced in configuring Appium environments to automate tests for native apps and mobile

Postman and Apache HTTP Client for comprehensive testing coverage. 
 Experienced in configuring Appium environments to automate tests for native apps and mobile 
web applications, ensuring compatibility across Android and iOS platforms. 
 Demonstrated proficiency in crafting and executing SQL queries in MySQL and Oracle databases, 
ensuring data integrity, and facilitating efficient backend testing procedures. 
 Hands-on  experience  with  configuration  management  tools  such  as  Git  and  GitHub,  alongside 
familiarity with Jenkins for seamless continuous integration. 
 Skilled in Bug Reporting using JIRA and Quality Center, leveraging these tools for effective defect 
tracking and resolution. 
 Possesses  strong  analytical  and  communication  skills,  capable  of  working  independently  with 
minimal supervision and as an integral part of a team. 
 Good  knowledge  in  different  programming  languages  like  core  Java,  JavaScript,  HTML  and

minimal supervision and as an integral part of a team. 
 Good  knowledge  in  different  programming  languages  like  core  Java,  JavaScript,  HTML  and 
databases like SQL server. 
 Created automation scripts and conducted functional and regression testing using Test Complete. 
 Experienced  in  Design  and  Implementation  of  Page  object  model  (POM)  framework  which 
supports both back-end systems and front end (UI). 
 Used  Jenkins for  the  continuous  Integration  Server –Installation,  Configuration,  Design  and 
Administration, and integrating these tools with other systems. 
 Effective Time Management Skills and consistent ability to meet client deadline. 
 Worked in Teams and can be part of the Organization Value addition.  
 Self- disciplined / Self-Motivated/ Ability to work independently and quality conscience.

 Identified  Test  Scenarios  and  prepared  the  Test  Scripts  based  on  the  Business  Requirement 
Document (BRD) and Software Requirements Specifications (SRS) Document. 
 Developed  and  maintained  automated  test  scripts  and  frameworks  using  Python,  facilitating 
efficient and scalable QA testing processes.  
 
TECHNICAL SKILLS: 
 
Languages C, Java, SQL, JavaScript. 
Testing Tools Selenium WebDriver, TestNG, Cucumber, Apache HTTP Client, Appium, 
Postman, Log4j, Apache POI, Rest Assured 
Web Services  RESTFUL Services, SOAP 
Bug Tracking Tools  JIRA, HP Quality Center, TestRail 
Web Technologies HTML, CSS, XML, JSON 
IDE Eclipse 
Build Tools Maven, Jenkins 
Databases and Tools Oracle SQL Developer, SQL Server, MYSQL 
Version Control Tools Git, SVN, Git Hub 
Platforms Windows, Mac, Android 
Dev Methodologies Agile/ Scrum, Waterfall

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE: 
 
Client: United Airlines, Chicago – IL      Jul 2022 – Till date                       
Designation: QA Automation Engineer 
 
Responsibilities: 
 Conducted in-depth analysis of system requirements and collaborated with product management 
teams  within  an  agile  environment  to  develop  a comprehensive  test  suite  for  web-based 
applications, ensuring alignment with project objectives. 
 Architected  a  custom  framework  from  scratch  using  Selenium,  Java,  and  TestNG,  enabling 
efficient  automation  testing  across  various  types  including  Sanity,  Functional,  Regression, 
Usability, and UI testing. 
 Implemented the Page Object Model Framework and crafted Selenium automation scripts using 
Java and TestNG, meticulously validating the functionality of web applications.

 Implemented the Page Object Model Framework and crafted Selenium automation scripts using 
Java and TestNG, meticulously validating the functionality of web applications. 
 Employed parameterization techniques in Selenium WebDriver to assess application performance 
against diverse sets of data, enhancing test coverage and robustness. 
 Leveraged TestNG Annotations in Selenium WebDriver to execute groups of tests as testing suites, 
streamlining test execution and management.

 Engaged  in  Agile  software  methodologies  within  a  team  environment,  actively  participating  in 
daily Scrum meetings to track progress and milestones. 
 Conducted  rigorous  regression  testing  to  safeguard  existing  functionalities  while  incorporating 
new features into the application, ensuring overall system stability. 
 Utilized  Apache  Http  Client  and  TestNG  for  comprehensive  Rest  API  testing,  verifying  endpoint 
accuracy and data interaction. 
 Leveraged  Oracle  SQL  Developer  to  verify  data  integrity  through the  execution  of  SQL  queries, 
ensuring reliability and consistency. 
 Demonstrated proficiency in mobile testing using Appium for both iOS and Android applications, 
employing simulators and emulators to ensure cross-platform compatibility and functionality.

 Implemented automation Scripts for mobile Native and Web applications on iOS and Android 
platforms using Appium and Java. 
 Performed tests on Emulators, Simulators and Real device mobile app testing. 
 Identified Mobile elements using Appium Inspector. 
 Provide expertise on software testing architecture, testing framework, automation framework, tools 
and technologies.  
 Identify and implement a sustainable test automation framework. Design automated tests,

Client: Metlife, Hanover – NJ       Sep 2020 – Jun 2022 
Designation: Automation QA Engineer      
 
Responsibilities: 
 Engaged  in  all  stages  of  the  software  testing  life  cycle  and  software  development  life  cycle, 
employing Agile methodologies to ensure efficient project execution.

 Conducted a wide range of testing activities including smoke testing, functional testing, regression 
testing, integration testing, user acceptance testing (UAT), and data validation testing, ensuring 
thorough evaluation of software functionality and reliability. 
 Played an active role in configuring and setting up the testing environment using Eclipse, TestNG, 
and Selenium WebDriver, facilitating seamless test execution and automation. 
 Developed,  executed, and  managed  automated  test  scripts  utilizing  Selenium  WebDriver  and 
TestNG, focusing on functional and regression testing objectives. 
 Pioneered   the   adoption   of   Behavior-Driven   Development   (BDD)   framework   within   the 
organization, collaborating closely with product owners to write feature files and step definitions 
using Cucumber. 
 Utilized  Selenium  extensively,  leveraging  XPath  and  CSS  locators  to  test  web  applications 
effectively.

using Cucumber.

effectively.

efficiency and coverage. 
 Executed  SQL  queries  to  validate  database  integrity  according  to  company  standards,  ensuring 
data accuracy and reliability. 
 Employed GitHub as a source repository system for version control and collaboration purposes. 
 Worked  closely  with  developers  to  address  design  and  development  errors,  facilitating  timely 
software releases for system testing. 
 Conducted testing on mobile native apps across Android, iPhone, and iPad devices using Appium, 
ensuring compatibility and functionality across various platforms. 
 Tested  REST  API  services  using  Rest  Assured  to  send  HTTP  requests  and  validate  responses, 
ensuring accurate functionality and data interaction.

 Tested  REST  API  services  using  Rest  Assured  to  send  HTTP  requests  and  validate  responses, 
ensuring accurate functionality and data interaction. 
 Conducted   regression   testing   on   new   builds   and   application   modifications   using   Selenium 
WebDriver, ensuring software stability and reliability. 
 Executed test cases, logged defects in JIRA, and collaborated with development teams to verify bug 
fixes and update bug statuses, ensuring accuracy and completeness in test reporting. 
 
Environment:  Agile,  Selenium  Web  Driver,  Java, Apache  POI,  Log4j,  Maven,  Eclipse,  TestNG,  Appium, 
HTML, GitHub, JIRA, POM, BDD, Extent Reports, Rest Assured, Restful services, Oracle Database.

Designation: Automation Test Engineer 
 
Responsibilities: 
 Actively  engaged  in  Agile  software  testing  processes,  participating  in  regular  QA  meetings  to 
discuss key application features and collaborate on test case creation and execution strategies. 
 Conducted  comprehensive  analysis  of  web  applications,  collaborating  closely  with  QA  leads  to 
develop robust test plans and test cases aligned with business requirements. 
 Held  accountable  for  maintaining  and  enhancing  regression  automation  test  scripts  for end-to-
end  testing  using  Selenium  WebDriver  with  Java,  ensuring  consistent  and  reliable  testing 
outcomes.

 Developed a Data-Driven Framework to facilitate testing with diverse sets of test data, enhancing 
test coverage and efficiency. 
 Implemented  the  Page Object  Framework  to  streamline  script  maintenance,  improving  overall 
script manageability and scalability. 
 Prepared  detailed  test  cycle  and  progress  reports,  analyzing  defect  metrics  and  implementing 
corrective   actions  for  subsequent  iterations,  ensuring  continuous  improvement  in  testing 
processes. 
 Performed front-end (Black Box) testing activities for critical functionalities such as login, logout, 
registration (enrollment), and change request submission modules. 
 Utilized Postman for comprehensive web services testing, ensuring robustness and reliability of 
API interactions. 
 Conducted  rigorous  backend  testing  using  SQL  queries  to  validate  data  integrity  within  the 
database and executed user-specific test cases by retrieving data from the database.

 Conducted  rigorous  backend  testing  using  SQL  queries  to  validate  data  integrity  within  the 
database and executed user-specific test cases by retrieving data from the database. 
 Leveraged  Jira  for  test  design,  test  development,  and  defect  tracking,  facilitating  seamless 
collaboration and streamlined project management. 
 Led  the  planning  and  execution  of  test  cases,  automated  test  scripts,  tracked  test  metrics, 
reported bugs, and verified bug fixes, ensuring software quality and reliability. 
 Maintained   close   communication   and   collaboration   with   development,   maintenance,   and 
business teams, ensuring alignment with changing requirements, builds, and release schedules. 
 Performed REST API Testing using Http Java Test Client for SOAP/REST web APIs. 
 Responsible for Black Box, Positive, Negative, Regression, Functional Testing. 
 Involved in writing SQL queries to extract the data from Oracle database.

 Responsible for Black Box, Positive, Negative, Regression, Functional Testing. 
 Involved in writing SQL queries to extract the data from Oracle database. 
 Worked on various technologies like SQL, UNIX in Waterfall environment. 
 Used Defect Management grid of HP ALM in logging and analyzing issues. 
 
Environment: Java, Selenium WebDriver, Postman, REST, TestNG, MySQL, SQL, MAVEN, JAVA, Junit, SVN, 
JIRA, Agile, JavaScript, Test Rail, Eclipse, Log4j, POM, Windows OS, Json, HTML
